entries.name: Mainnet (EVM L3)
entries.details: Horizen has migrated to an EVM-native L3 on Base. It uses the OP Stack for fast, low-cost transactions.

entries.name: Secure Node
entries.details: Requires a dedicated IP and 92% uptime. Historically rewarded for securing the network.

entries.name: Super Node
entries.details: Requires 8GB RAM and 4-core CPU. These nodes handle sidechain certificate processing.

entries.name: Confidential Compute
entries.details: Uses Trusted Execution Environments (TEEs) for private smart contract execution.
